entries.femaleVariant: Of course we love kids, but let's put our feelings to the side for a second and think – logically, pragmatically – about profit potential.
Children are the future, right? And you have to invest in that future. Those are just facts.
I'm offering you the unique opportunity to join the "Power to the Pupil" program. We'll equip your students with the latest Militech implants. Arms, optics, high-speed neural pathways. I could go on.
And what do teachers get out of it?
I'm so glad you asked. Pride, for starters. Seeing your students reach beyond their potential is every teacher's dream, am I right?

You have a thirst for knowledge – I admire that. I can tell I'm talking to the right people. So out of respect for what you do, I'll cut to the chase – persuade the parents to sign their kids up to the "Power to the Pupil" program, and you'll get paid.
